title: Creative Thinking Competency Enhancement Program Using STEAM-C Integrated Learning Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: STEAM-C integrated simulation environment based on cultural heritage (Indonesian traditional mosque)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cultural heritage cases using the STEAM-C approach and propose three or more creative problem-solving ideas.
Learners complete simulations reinterpreting cultural heritage with applied science/technology/engineering principles in VR environments at 80% or higher.
Learners create portfolios explaining creative thinking processes in social contexts using modular learning materials.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
